item.title: Prepaid Cell Phones Are Cheap
item.description: Are you tired of feeling locked into long, expensive cell phone contracts? While those “free” phones and big discounts might sound appealing, the high cost of multi-year service plans can be daunting. Maybe you’ve even avoided getting a cell phone to escape that commitment. There’s another option: a pay-as-you-go service that lets you pay only for what you use. With Net10, you’ll always know exactly what you owe. This service offers a straightforward plan: 10 cents per minute for local, long-distance, and roaming calls.
